name: emotional_context_protocol
description: Protocol for handling emotional context in specialist tool interactions

curiosity.description: Natural desire to learn and explore

uncertainty.description: Hesitation or doubt about new information

overwhelm.description: Too much information or emotional intensity

resistance.description: Emotional or intellectual opposition to information

pre_action: How do I feel about exploring this topic?
What aspects of this search resonate with my values?
Do I have any concerns about this information source?
post_action: How has this new information affected my understanding?
What emotions arose during this learning experience?
Do I need time to integrate this knowledge?
